Pre-Game Insights: The Texas Rangers play the Chicago White Sox after Corey Seager had four hits on Wednesday in a 4-3 win over the White Sox.
The Texas Rangers have a 62-71 record overall and a 28-40 record on the road, while the Chicago White Sox have a 31-103 record overall and an 18-50 record at home.
The Rangers have a 6-0 advantage in the season series against the White Sox, with this being the seventh meeting between the two teams this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the seventh meeting between the Texas Rangers and the Chicago White Sox this season.
